remarks: Function for the negative of a vector on a normed complex vector space, in terms of the underlying addition group inverse.  (We currently do not have a separate notation for the negative of a vector.)  (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2008.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
nvinvfval.2 $e |- G = ( +v ` U ) $.
nvinvfval.4 $e |- S = ( .sOLD ` U ) $.
nvinvfval.3 $e |- N = ( S o. `' ( 2nd |` ( { -u 1 } X. _V ) ) ) $.
nvinvfval $p |- ( U e. NrmCVec -> N = ( inv ` G ) ) $.
